content:
@everyone
Hi everyone,

Please take a moment to complete the GloRuWriClu Sign Up form. It will help us gage the size of cohort we will have.

Also, there has been an update to the description of Monthly Sprints in the doc, so please take a look at the example which illustrates what will happen during weekly and monthly meetings.
https://hackmd.io/69FQfH3PSOSJA3GHQ-5R2w

Thanks!
Sorry @Doc Jones, what does "cohort" mean in this context? Does it mean people who are signing up within 6 week blocks?

Tim McNamara said:

Sorry Doc Jones, what does "cohort" mean in this context? Does it mean people who are signing up within 6 week blocks?
``
It means the group o people who are assembled to contribute to the rustc dev guide.
for people that have asked, you may also find some information about what this is about in #t-compiler/wg-rustc-dev-guide > meeting 2021.08.10
